EmailTemplate.name: Reporting Training
EmailTemplate.subject: Report Training Information - {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
SunPower is a Premier Salesforce customer; one of these benefits is free online training.
Below we have provided some choices for online training to assist you in report creation within Salesforce.
Analyze Your Data With Report
Getting Started with Report and Dashboards
These are Salesforce provided training, so you will be required to use your Salesforce login to view.
Here is additional training material. Ensure to uncheck the "Instructor Led" option and click "Update Search."
